content: आक्रोशः, --शनं {@--1@} Calling or crying out, vociferation, loud cry or sound. {@--2@} Censure, blame, reviling; आक्रोशमपि परिहासमाकलयंति <ls>K. 235</ls>, <ls n="K.">291</ls>; abuse <ls>Y. 2. 302.</ls> {@--3@} A curse, imprecation; °गर्भमेवमुक्तं <ls>K. 291</ls>, <ls n="K.">346.</ls> {@--4@} An oath.
